in.ac.iitk.cse.putwb.classify

Class DataClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.ac.iitk.cse.putwb.classify.DataClassifier

  • public class DataClassifier
extends Object
    This class is responsible for performing classification tasks over a given Dataset, with a chosen classification mechanism. It can also report model accuracies, using k-fold cross validation.
    Author:
    Saurabh Srivastava

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataClassifier

        public DataClassifier(Class<? extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier> classifierType,
                      Dataset dataset)
        Creates a DataClassifier for given dataset with chosen classifier and 5-fold validation.
        Parameters:
        classifierType - The classifier to use (must be one of the options defined as a constant in the class)
        dataset - The dataset to classify

      • DataClassifier

        public DataClassifier(Class<? extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier> classifierType,
                      Dataset dataset,
                      int k)
        Creates a DataClassifier for given dataset with chosen classification options.
        Parameters:
        classifierType - The classifier to use (must be one of the options defined as a constant in the class)
        dataset - The dataset to classify
        k - The value of k for k-fold cross validation

    • Method Detail

      • findClassifierByName

        public static Class<? extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier> findClassifierByName(String classifierName)
                                                                                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Attempts to find a classifier type, with the name. The classifier must be corresponding to one of the constants defined in DataClassifier
        Parameters:
        classifierName - The name of the classifier
        Returns:
        The classifier type corresponding to the provided name
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the name doesn't match any of the corresponding classifier constants

      • getClassifierOptions

        public static List<String> getClassifierOptions()
        Returns a List of available classifier types, based on the defined constants in the Dataset class
        Returns:
        a List of available classifier types valid for usage

      • evaluateModel

        public void evaluateModel()
                   throws Exception
        Attempts to perform a k-fold cross validation over the dataset for the chosen classifier
        Throws:
        Exception - if the cross-validation process runs into a glitch

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy()
        Returns the accuracy of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        the overall accuracy in percentage if the model has been evaluated, -1 otherwise

      • getClassifierType

        public Class<? extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier> getClassifierType()
        Returns the classifier type being used by this classifer
        Returns:
        the classifier type

      • getDatasetDescription

        public String getDatasetDescription()
        Returns a string describing this dataset
        Returns:
        A textual description of the dataset

      • getFN

        public double[] getFN()
        Returns the false negative rates (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of false negative rates, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getFP

        public double[] getFP()
        Returns the false positive rates (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of false positive rates, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getModel

        public PredictionModel getModel()
        Build (if not already built) and return the prediction model
        Returns:
        The PredictionModel representing this classifier

      • getOptions

        public String[] getOptions()
        Get the appropriate options set for the classifier
        Returns:
        the options, or null if no options have been set for the classifier as yet

      • getPR

        public double[] getPR()
        Returns the area under the PR Curve values (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of area under the PR Curve values, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getPrecision

        public double[] getPrecision()
        Returns the precision values (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of precision values, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getRecall

        public double[] getRecall()
        Returns the recall values (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of recall values, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getROC

        public double[] getROC()
        Returns the area under the ROC Curve values (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of area under the ROC Curve values, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

      • getTP

        public double[] getTP()
        Returns the true positive rates (for every class individually) of the given model upon k-fold cross validation evaluation
        Returns:
        an array of true positive rates, corresponding to all classes in the dataset

        Parameters:
